title: Ship Configuration Schema
description: A ship configuration, used for defining new ship classes.

map_name.title: Class Name
map_name.description: The name of the ship class, as viewable in-game.

map_short_name.title: Shortened Class Name
map_short_name.description: A shortened version of the ship class name, used in things such as the manifest.

prefix.title: Ship Default Prefix
prefix.description: The prefix of the ship class, appended to randomly generated names when they're first purchased.

namelists.title: Namelists
namelists.description: A list of namelists that this ship class will draw from when first bought to get a random name. All options can be found in the ship_names.json file.

map_path.title: Map File Path
map_path.description: The path to the ship class's map file. Use forward slashes (/) for directories, and include the .dmm extension. Map files must be somewhere under the _maps folder.

map_id.title: Map ID (DEPRECATED)
map_id.description: The ID of the ship class. Deprecated, code uses map_path instead.

job_slots.title: Job Slots
job_slots.description: A list of job slots that this ship class will have when placed. The First Slot will always be the 'captain' that the purchaser becomes.

oneOf.description: A preset job slot, must match a job name in the code (Job names are found in the jobs' respective files).
A custom job slot, can be any name, but needs an outfit and slot count to be valid. The name is the string you are currently viewing.

outfit.description: The name of the outfit that will be placed in this slot. Must be exact, will error if not found in the code.

officer.description: Whether or not this slot is an officer slot. This determines if the job will have a chevron in the manifest, as well as the amount of slots cannot be changed by the crew in-round.

slots.description: The number of slots that this slot will have roundstart. The crew can change this, up to doubling it, in-round.

cost.title: Class Cost
cost.description: The cost of the ship class, in credits.

roundstart.title: Random Roundstart Selection
roundstart.description: Whether or not the ship has a chance to be randomly selected as the free roundstart ship.
